title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Install via pip (ollama) and chat with local models using a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama. Works in Node.js and browsers via npm package ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama. Use any LangChain abstraction (LLM, embeddings, tool-calling) with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style). Run locally with Docker; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama. Offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, and Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama. Simple interface to chat and generate embeddings with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with extra helpers like model search and bulk pull.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar chat interface.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama. Supports .NET 6+ with async streaming.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized with one command.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and persistent storage.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama slash command to query local models right from Slack.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama with async HTTP and WebSocket streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama. Import github.com/ollama/ollama/api to embed local LLMs in Go apps.
